sial.compiler

Class CommandLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • sial.compiler.CommandLine

  • public class CommandLine
extends java.lang.Object
    This CommandLineOptions class encapsulates the command line options that can be passed to the SIAL compiler. The String array obtained from the command line is passed to the constructor, which decodes the elements and sets the corresponding variables appropriately. The default values are given below. Note that PATH is an instance of a SialPath class, which manages this value. OUTPUT_DIR and INPUT_FILE_OR_DIR are stored as File object. Note: these options should work, but have not been tested with aces4.
